ProductInfo.Features:

<9> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <10> 58mm UV Filter + <11> Additional 58mm UV Filter + <12> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<13> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <14> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <15> LCD Screen Protectors + <16> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet
